lines.text: Maybe those tattoos on the wizard's face... aren't tattoos?
Like... maybe the dead guy wrote his name on the wizard's face in some kind of code before he died? As a clue?
A) Nobody does that. I've been investigatin' homicides for twenty years, and not one victim has ever written their assailant's name in code.
Killers sometimes write down someone else's name to frame them, but shockingly, the first thing on a dyin' man's mind ain't cryptography.
B) Why would he write his own name? How in Sam Hill would that help him?
And C), he's not gonna write it in tattoos on a guy's face because that's stupid and there's no reason to do that.
Hey, man! I'm just trying to figure out all the angles, here!
Anything could be a clue, y'know?
Except that thing. That specific thing is definitely not a clue about that.
